column2: An ambitious [From.GetManWoman] entered my court with an unusual request. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] introduced [From.GetHerselfHimself] as [From.GetTitledFirstName], a noble of the house [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] announced to me that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has rightful claims to foreign lands and is requesting help from me to gather more men for [From.GetHerHis] cause.

An ambitious [From.GetManWoman] entered my court with an unusual request. But this was no stranger, I recognized my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] ! [From.GetSheHeCap] announced to me that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has rightful claims to foreign lands and is requesting help from me to gather more men for [From.GetHerHis] cause.
Send some of my levy temporarily.
The adventurer that you helped and support, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has managed to get rid of the vile thieves that preyed upon the inhabitants of the [cleared_province.GetFullBaseName].
The adventurer that you helped and support, [From.GetTitledFirstName], made the smugglers disappear from the [cleared_province.GetFullBaseName], allowing its trade to recover.
The adventurer that you helped and support, [From.GetTitledFirstName], drove away the robbers that plagued the roads of the [cleared_province.GetFullBaseName].
Give a well deserved reward to [From.GetHerHim]!

You have heard that [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s band has plundered the [looted_province.GetFullBaseName]. You are unclear whether the looting was ordered by [From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetHerselfHimself] or not.
